name: Starship Destroyer VR
description:
It's the year 3030 and the Earth is being attacked by alien invaders. You are the planet's greatest Starship Destroyer and our last defence against the Hypercons. Destroy the alien spaceships in intense 8 bit virtual reality.

Addictive, ad-free blasting!

This app has been designed to work with Google Cardboard VR compatible virtual reality headsets.
